original_text: And the Lord magnified Solomon exceedingly in the sight of all Israel, and bestowed upon him such royal majesty as had not been on any king before him in Israel.
korean_text: 여호와께서 솔로몬을 모든 이스라엘의 목전에서 심히 크게 하시고 또 왕의 위엄을 그에게 주사 그전 이스라엘 모든 왕보다 뛰어나게 하셨더라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord magnified Solomon exceedingly
in the sight of all Israel
and bestowed upon him such royal majesty
as had not been on any king before him
